00034 const SimpleString CommonServiceValues::GetOmiscidServiceDnsSdType()
00035 {
00036     static SimpleString OmiscidServiceDnsSdType;
00037 
00038     if ( OmiscidServiceDnsSdType.IsEmpty() )
00039     {
00040         SimpleString DefaultDomain = "_bip._tcp";
00041 
00042         char * Option = getenv( "OMISCID_WORKING_DOMAIN" );
00043         if ( Option == NULL || DefaultDomain == Option )
00044         {
00045             OmiscidServiceDnsSdType = DefaultDomain;
00046             OmiscidTrace( "OMISCID_WORKING_DOMAIN not override. Use '%s'.\n", DefaultDomain.GetStr() );
00047             return OmiscidServiceDnsSdType;
00048         }
00049 
00050         // Copy the environment variable
00051         size_t size = strlen( Option );
00052         TemporaryMemoryBuffer tmpdomain(128);
00053 
00054         if ( size >= RegtypeLength )
00055         {
00056             OmiscidServiceDnsSdType = DefaultDomain;
00057             fprintf( stderr, "OMISCID_WORKING_DOMAIN too long (%d max). Use '%s' instead.\n", RegtypeLength-1, DefaultDomain.GetStr() );
00058             return OmiscidServiceDnsSdType;
00059         }
00060 
00061         if ( sscanf( Option, "_bip_%[^.]._tcp", (char*)tmpdomain) != 1 )
00062         {
00063             OmiscidServiceDnsSdType = DefaultDomain;
00064             OmiscidError( "OMISCID_WORKING_DOMAIN do not look like '_bip_XXX._tcp'. Use '%s' instead.\n", DefaultDomain.GetStr() );
00065             return OmiscidServiceDnsSdType;
00066         }
00067 
00068         // OmiscidServiceDnsSdType = DefaultDomain;
00069         OmiscidServiceDnsSdType = Option;
00070         OmiscidTrace( "OMISCID_WORKING_DOMAIN defined in environment variable. Use '%s'.\n", OmiscidServiceDnsSdType.GetStr() );
00071     }
00072 
00073     return OmiscidServiceDnsSdType;
00074 }
